title: Looking for group members "Shaco"
body: Hi guys, I am just looking for people in my group :) please let me know if you are interested. Group name is called Mad clones also if you are interested add me ^.^ lets have fun, also people who love playing shaco lets rock n roll in game with our game play {{champion:35}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:12}}  Msg me here so I can add u guys ^.^

replies.body: arn't these mains clubs kinda pointless? if you have 5 people who play shaco, who will get to actually play him lel

its a group, who love playing shaco, also who follows shaclone XD and one for all will come soon :) not only this people can play this champ and we will see who plays best, whose play style is awesome so we all can learn new tricks and most important thing I cant wait to see other clones ^.^ add me if u wana b in group{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I main zilean (M7) in ranked but I love shaco (M6), especially in normals, since I'm still not really good enough for ranked with shaco yet, can I still join? I also really like watching shaclones stream and youtube channel.
Ik its a little late but i'm a {{champion:35}} main could you add me to the group?

Hi. i am a shaco main. could you add me to the club :D 

my summoner name is - Shemomedjamo 

TY

Oh Shaco.... gotta be my fave jungler.
So satisfying to pull off that level 2 cheese =)
Gotta add me.
shaco is love shaco is life ill happily join this club
